subject: Access permission for approach road to new retail outlets along National Highways
text: Hr-t4 <oft4 <THT uiferrrut Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 Fax 91-11-25093507/25093514 (Wa ttavt, 435 wa57 #r TIAM @Ai) Extn 2223/23181246812553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No: ` 14041/1/OOz-Admn: 20.05,05 BOLICY MATTERS: TECHNCAL (52 /20052 Sub: Access Permission for approach road to #ew Retail sutlets along National Highways Please refer to our Policy Circular nos 13/2003 dated 16.04.03 and 43/2004 dated 13.09,04 on the above Subject. The Minis of Shipping Road Transport & Highways has observed vide their  letter Mio_ RWINH-12017/3/200SNNH-A(GJ) dated 4th April, 2005 that while examining the NOC proposals for new retail outlets; the proposals could not be appreciated properly due (o non-availability of sOme information 2 In view of this the Ministry has degired that in addition t0 the existing "Norms for the Access for Fuel Stations, Service Stations and Rest Areas National Highways" _ the   foliowing   additional information should also be furnished along with the proposals to be forwarded to the Ministry: (1) Index map of the State showing the location of proposed retail outlet on the concerned NH (i) In case of divided carriageway, the location of the median cut ftom the proposed outlet shall be furnished; (ii)All the drawing &nd documents should be forwarded to the Ministry duly signed by none other than & NHAI officer not belw the rank of Project Director only. 3_ A copy of the Ministry of Shipping Road Transport Highways Letter no_ RWINH-12017/3/20051NH-4(GJ) dated 4th April, 2005 is Forwarded herewith: All concerned are requested to comply with the above instructions (G.
